content: Switched from the Amazon underground app since it's no longer supported. This one is slower in almost every respect, click on the add to cart button and it's a 50/50 chance that it will actually work (had the same problem with the underground app but not nearly as often). trying to click on a product picture so you can zoom in only works sometimes. I reinstalled the underground app from backup (rooted phone)   All and all I'll keep using the Amazon underground app as long as I can or maybe just not shop at amazon except when I'm on a computer as this app borders on annoying edging toward useless.

App generally functions as expected and is fine on that front. However, my notification bar is for notifications, not ads. It is inappropriate for the app to be "notifying" me about things like "time to stock up? View recommendations based on your recent purchases". I get that you can technically turn these off, but I should not need to go into app settings to disable ads in my notification bar.

Big disappointment. Just about every third (or so) time I use it, it gives me the "Oops, something went wrong" message. I never had this issue with the older app, but it seems I can't use it anymore. I would switch back in a heartbeat if I could. Too frustrating ... I've been going to Amazon only on my laptop since this new app makes me crazy. Advice to Amazon for the future -- if it ain't broke, don't fix it.

Having been forced to use this instead of the Underground app it is such a step backwards. The wishlist doesn't load unless you add a new item, the 'buy it now' button doesn't work as it just repeatedly asks to log in then returns to the same screen. The only way to purchase is to add to basket and then go to shopping cart. So many bugs for a popular app

If I force close the app, then reopen it, I can browse for a few minutes before it stops responding again. "sorry, there's a problem with this page right now. We're working on fixing it" and a 'try again' button. Only thing that works is force closing and reopening again. I get maybe two to three minutes of browsing before it stops responding. Can't wait for this long running issut to be fixed properly.

So frustrated. Amazon made me get this new app for shopping. Now I try to add something to my cart and it freezes. I try to see other colors and the looking through the stockroom option never finishes loading. I can't change the quantity. I use Amazon for everything. It is my go to. I don't have time to shop in stores but i also don't have time to waste trying to get a glitchy app to work! Fix this please!

This new "Amazon Shopping" experience app is a tad glitchy. While I can understand Amazon's efforts to update the app with a cleaner design, conceivably I feel it makes my search results that much more convoluted and difficult to sort through. The wish list functionality is atrocious. The old app made it easy to rename and manage the lists. It takes too long to load (and my phone is newer and speedy with everything else). If we can bring back some of the old functionality, that'd be great.

The app feels fresh and updated compared to the last one, as well as organized. My only issue is it really seems like a work in progress, as it's glitchy and laggy, and sometimes the links/buttons don't respond (for me, at least). It's not TOO annoying and I love Amazon, so I plan to keep using it, but it would be nice if it ran smoother.

I keep having to reinstall the "latest" version over and over. This used to be my go to shopping app, but since the influx of tiny Asian clothing and sketchy products I am concerned with the company as a whole. Prime used to be a good deal, then they want you to pay for the music, when most of the songs are unavailable. If you pay for the music sometimes your music is greyed out and it tells you that it is unavailable. Please improve your service.

This new app just looks like a flashier reskin of the old one. I'm guessing they bundled their other services in it so it would have a built in video/music player... Of course, I didn't need to waste the space on my phone for that since I don't use those services, this app drains more battery than the old one, and will not run as quickly because it's more demanding. Way to be just like everyone else, Amazon. Way to only look at your biggest market share and give the finger to everyone else.

Use this app a TON, but it's suddenly stopped allowing me to click to enlarge product photos. The little round, spinning timer just keeps twirling at top of a blank white screen. Restarted phone over & over, rebooted app, nothing has worked. Works fine on husband's identical phone. I don't understand why this is happening suddenly. I did nothing different. Afraid to delete & reinstall app. I have thousands of items stored in folders & in my cart. Don't wanna lose it all. Years worth of stuff.

The latest update removes the prime filter for search results . I never buy anything unless it's marked as prime. Without the filter it is a total pain to have to go through all the results to find the prime items. Since I purchase items from Amazon multiple times a week this is really annoying. This makes the application almost unusable. I guess I'll use the webpage until it's fixed. Really, really, annoying

I use this app more often than I would like to admit. The app is generally good but Amazon's customer service is deplorable. I'm not sure if it was just a language barrier or a general misunderstanding but I went through five different agents (without being warned of the transitions) and none of them were able to assist me in my request (to have my subscription item delivered early). After an hour of being bounced around and not getting anywhere I just told them to forget about it.

this app does not work at all, on the main home page it breaks and re-directs to a verry unhelpful error page that only says "uhoh something has gon wrong on our end." it has been like this for months, ive tryed re-installing, re-logging and neither of them worked. it also seems that quite a few other people are having this issue as well. i feel this greatly reduces how effectivly people can shop with amazon because not everyone has a computer (yes the site works just fine on pc).

It's kind of shameful that this app is so buggy. There are times when it won't open. It worked fine this morning and won't open this evening. It also did that a lot during prime days back in July. The wish list feature at the bottom of screen is buggy, often it doesn't load and sometimes it's not even visible. Of all companies, Amazon should not have an app with these kinds of issues.

It's not just the app. The Amazon website dosen't make sence. For example, if an item is listed as $8.40 and I click on it to add it to my cart the price immediately jumps up to $12 or higher. All prices are in Canadian dollars so I don't understand why they do this. There are tons of things about the Amazon website that are shifty like that. It's a completely dishonest company that seriously needs better standards and at least some percision. It runs on complete chaos.

Why do amazon apps suck so much? If i want to do shopping on amazon i basically have to wait until i can use a computer for it (which i only have a work computer atm). An old amazon app i had used to work fine but after being told i needed to update to this, I'm constantly running into problems. Like links/products that can't seem to be clicked on. Lots of little things that will get messed up that add up to making it too much hassle to bother with.

Hate the colors; the teal and white is hideous. Why are you dropping support for the other app in favor of this one? I also can't delete things off my wish list. When I click the text, nothing happens. I can still add notes and move the item to another list, but the delete function doesn't work. Barely just started using this app and already hate it.

Giveaways need work. Whether viewed in the app or on a computer, the Giveaways list needs to show what you've entered and what you haven't (maybe a simple check mark in the corner). For those of us that try to keep up with them, it's a waste of time to have to click every one to see if you already entered it. Such a simple change would mean the world.

It does its job when it works. Orderung, tracking, and shipping is seamless. The only gripe I have with this app is that it constantly crashes and sometimes stalls while loading screens. It's not hardware issue or WiFi, since I've checked, my connection is fast at >70mb/s cable line. I'm running the latest updates.

I hate being forced to update an app that is working and when I do I get a pale imitation of the one that I loved! This app is slow and stops and says "open app again" so I do. And guess what? I have to start all over again to get to the item where it cut me off! Absolutely HATE this! You need to fix it or bring the old app back...I have been loving Amazon up to now but this is enough aggravation to change my mind!

App has not been working correctly for a few weeks. the last 3 days I have been trying to purchase items & the home screen won't even load. Pops a picture of a dog saying "oops, something went wrong. go to home page" clicking just reveals another dog with the same prompt. I have checked for updates, uninstalled & reinstalled with the same results. works fine from a browser which leaves me to believe this is an issue with the app itself.

One of the best but basic customer service experiences you can find. Real fast delivery options and secure lockers if you decide that instead of your address. The app is simple and easy to use. You can also track your package and see exactly how many stops away the driver is. The ads are too much and some customers feel outraged by them.

Installed this because old app kept saying 'support for this app will end soon'. Never got past start-up screen. No matter what I try, it throws some error (mostly 'something went wrong'). Finally gave up. Never expected from Amazon. Oh well, no one is perfect. There is always webpage to fall back to. Wish I could get my old app back.

This app is good, and I buy things on it all the time, but lately it has been exhibiting a problem in loading any kind of search. I usually have to find new items to add to my wishlist on a browser. I find this somewhat a big issue, but other than that, it works well and has a wide range of useful products and informative books.

Amazon is terrible- I had to pay for a broken item. Amazon (the seller) delivered a broken item, and scheduled a UPS pick up for the broken item that never came. UPS didn't accept the item when I tried to drop it off for a replacement. Customer service was useless. Wasted 4 hours of my life, issue was never resolved. No way for customer feedback or seller review, so I'm rating the app. Paid for a broken item. Furious.

Its ridiculous that Amazon app dont have a easy to locate Logout button and one have to waste good amount of time on youtube to learn how to signOut. I checked a few videos on YouTube but looks like Amazon found that people are providing tricks to signout and so in subsequent update they have disabled those options too... Awesome way to force people stay with you... Its horrible..

Had to remove 2 stars 1/30/2018... Not my dependable Amazon now....You blew away 2 day delivery and over night option to pay just a few $$ more. Prices gone up vs quaukity gone sown. such a shame. I use to just love and praise Amazon. They've worked on issues for me. Quick delivery on most items gone. Customer Service is good though. Wayyyy better than Walmart!

App would be great, but since the latest version was released, a problem with the search box arose. when you click in the search box, you have to click in the box again...a second time to bring the keyboard up. WHY?! very annoying! WALMART'S APP DOES NOT MAKE YOU DO THIS. if you fix this, id gladly amend my review to 5 stars...

under ground or prime version 16 was better. this new app version 5 is so slow i can text faster than it can load pages. it hangs up alot and my phone hs 32gb of ram and less than 18 months old. it is hardly usable do to its always loading. also it is super annoying that it does not retain your recent searches, so you have to retype everything for every search modification where underground did and it made altering your search quick and easy. i like how list were minimized thats it.

this app is constantly crashing! ive updated, uninstalled and reinstalled, anything i could think that would help and constantly get the "oops something went wrong" notification. i tried to use the general amazon app but was told support for it was ending and i had to use this app. now im taking up space on my phone for an app i can use maybe 30% of the time.

Caused Pop Up Ads to appear when using all apps in phone. If I opened my phone app to make a call - pop up ad. If I opened my text app to send a message - pop up ad. Became too annoying so I uninstalled. Please limit to only occur when using the Amazon app only, and maybe I'll re-install. Shame because I'm a frequent shopper on prime & this would be more ideal than going to the website direct. This didn't happen with the old Amazon app.

Nice shopping experience, although I hate that when you try and search for sexual adult products through the application, it only shows a few items, even if you try to refresh it. You guys need to fix this, so that sexual products can be browsed with ease. I dont know if you guys hide the search from the app,but you need to fix this issue #Amazon.

The app server appears to constantly crash. error message appears with a dog "Uh Oh something went wrong on our end" been like this for months. Even if I try to shop on the web browser it constantly opens the item up in the app, then crashes. I can't even shop on the web browser. please fix!!!

The app is so in your face! "BUY THIS!" pop ups. Pushing Alexa-- "Alexa, when is my order ready?" Taking me back to my cart every minute and even posting the cart items on the page you're already on-- jeez! It often skips what you were doing and bugs out. Since when did Amazon get so desparate? There is no way to go forward button back to where you were. I'm using the current app and only it asks for an update today, so it's not a review for an older version. This app has always been like this.

I closed my Amazon account a couple of months ago and was told that I would receive a credit for the amount I had overpaid and that my account will be closed immediately. However, for the past 2 months my account is still being debited for the monthly fee and I need this to stop immediately because now it has created NSF charges on my checking account because Amazon these were not included when checking the balance on my account. This is very disheartening!!

awful. simply awful and limited. tracking is useless. no accurate location of the item. no way to retrieve the pick up code. no communication. you could talk to alexa or whatever which doesn't help. yeah you can buy the stuff you want but don't expect to solve problems concerning your purchases via this app. it will give you no clue but headache. useless.

crashes constantly tells me to encounter the problem uninstalled we installed several times have done all the updates. takes forever to load anything I searched for and usually stalls out and tells me it's encountered a problem. I'm running a Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge and do not have this problem in any other app all other apps run quickly smoothly and snappy however Amazon sucks

so much worse than the first app, this is just a way for Amazon to force adds on you and every other time you press view cart, it prompts you to sign up for a credit card, or Amazon prime, or a totally unrelated add "based" on what you buy. basically it purposely navigates you from the page you wanted to view. 1 star all day for you Amazon, really should be ashamed.

The ability to limit searches to products with prime shipping only has been removed? Why? I dont have time to scroll through dozen or even hundreds of cheap items with exorbitant shipping that are going to take three weeks to arive from asia with no return policy. This is not the reason I use Amazon prime. looks like I'll be going back to spending my money with eBay until you guys can fix this app

always throws up the "something went wrong" message and you have to use chrom instead of the app. This has been happening so often that i use chrome by default. what is wierd is everything looks to load fine for just a second then the overlay message pops blocking all the content. My guess is the issue is something not even related to what i am trying to do, like loading advertising or something SMH. Razer Phone

Uninstalled as it decided to pop-up marketing notifications, which I hadn't said it could. The potentially more useful notification about my Amazon locker order being ready for collection didn't link to a scannable barcode so I had to open my email to get that anyway. Really can't see any advantage to this app over just using the website on my phone.

I used to use it several times a day, but now it has a crash bug. So that's great. Amazon at whole notwithstanding (I'm an ex-Prime Member because 2018 was the year of lost privileges and broken promises), this is an excellent app. When it opens, which it doesn't anymore.

Ever since this app updated it's basically unusable. Everytime you try to open anything to look at the details of a item a error message comes up. I've been trying to order these shoes for 2 days, but everytime I try and change the size a message comes up saying a error has occurred go to amazon home.

Amazon as a company is still good but this is a horrible upgrade, the old one worked better. Not a fan, i like being secure but entering letters that are crossed out 10 times is not a step in the right direction I feel amazon really dropped the ball on this one. Also this is not an UPGRADE this is a new app. So now i have delete the old one enter all my info and verify.

The newest version of the Amazon App doesn't require to download from an unknown source, which is why I uninstalled the older version. The new Amazon App has an easy to use user interface. I much prefer the new version. Love shopping on Amazon and being able to track package progress.

I really like the amazon app but right now it's being very annoying on my galaxy s7 edge. Every time I open the app it tells me support for this app is going to end soon and I need to update to the latest version. I already did update! after the first or second time this happened I clicked the update now option and updated but now it still always pops up..... I will change to 5 stars once that's taken care of.

the app keeps crashing. Everytime I select any item from the plethora of categories, on clicking next on any screen a dog appears and tells me something is wrong. i don't mind the dog, but what in the name of God went wrong?? i tried data on the phone, wifi, hotspot..its the same issue. tried iPhone amd same thing. Fix the damn thing

No Sign Out option with this version of the app. In order to sign out & switch accounts, you have to clear your app's data cache in your phone. Not intuitive or convenient to say the least. The rest of the app is as good or better than the previous version.

The mammoth collection of products and services that can be ordered from Amazon are organized conveniently in this feature rich app. Options such as personal lists, surveys, try and buy, or gift finder complete a solid experience. Custom sorting of shopping list items which is existing in desktop version is missing though.

The app is mostly fine, but it drives me nuts that it doesn't have "Look Inside" as an option for books. I often read the first page or so of a book to see if the author's writing style is something that clicks with me. I can't do this on either the app or the mobile version of the site, so I'm still using the desktop site on my phone for this. I don't understand why there's no Look Inside feature for the app.

The ability to limit searches to products with prime shipping only has been removed? Why? I dont have time to scroll through dozen or even hundreds of cheap items with exorbitant shipping that are going to take three weeks to arive from asia with no return policy. This is not the reason I use Amazon. Bring back the old app.

I am a prime member and couldn't be happier. I have dealt with amazon customer service a couple of time and they are easy and great to deal with. They also have a messenger option for their customer service which make handling questions much eaiser. The prime video and music are great additions to the service and when coupled with an Echo makes for an enjoyable experience. All and all I am very satisfied customer.

I have always used the Amazon underground app until it was mentioned to install this app and boy was that a bad decision. The app crashes like it's 2008 and then shows a lovely whiten or black screen. In the end I just used the website and now saving money because I'm not spending as much through the app!! What a real let down after all these years.

The whole thing with the Add-on Items is stupid. No one should be forced to spend $25 if they don't want to. That part should be OPTIONAL! I just want to buy two toys for my daughter and I can't because I don't want to spend $25 dollars and I can't check out with just two Add-On items that costs add up to less than $25. Amazon fix this please.

This app is terrible. Its so slow and lags all the time. Cant even scroll, it goes down like one listing then you have to wait forever for the next listings to load. When I search something I have to go back and click on the search bar a bunch of times because it wont bring up my keyboard.

disgraceful honestly. terrible service. terrible slow and buggy app. doesn't let me cancel something and puts a subscription through when actually I cancelled that the month before but it charged me for the month after when I cancelled this before it had charged. doesn't allow me to order things due to 'payment revision' yet everything is in order and correct then as soon as its sorted amazon automatically puts through a order which shouldn't happen. worse by customer service being useless w/ it

PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE FIX THIS APP TO STOP IT FROM ADDING EVERY ITEM YOU HAPPEN TO TOUCH ON THE SCREEN TO ONE OF YOUR LISTS WHILE TRYING TO SCROLL!!! I swear I spend half my time deleting unwanted items off my list while shopping on this app. Just make it do the only way to quickly add items to your favorites list is to actually long press (make it longer) and drag the item ALLLLL the way to the bottom.

so far so good. only issue is that I had 2 gift cards. I typed in the number upon checkout n something happened that I had to relog in. The cards are now showing a $0.00 balance and I don't think any money was actually applied to my order. Basically I'm out $39.88. As one of the cards was for $30 n another had a $9.88 balance left on it.

This app will not go away. It interrupts everything I do. I will never shop on Amazon again! I was asked to edit my review. Ok I do not recommend downloading the Amazon app. The reason I am writing this is because the app just crashed the video I was watching and popped up my review that wants an edit. If you enjoy using your phone to watch videos, texting, reading any sort of message, or browsing web sites DO NOT DOWNLOAD APP!!! Obviously. the richest man in the world can afford great techies.

Everytime I log in or search for something on the app I get an error note saying, "UH-OH Something went wrong on our end." with a picture of a dog... unimpressed as deleting and reinstalling has not made a difference. Another android user also has this problem. This has been an issue for 2 weeks now.

Amazon Prime is the best that I've had everything that I've ordered I've gotten. they keep you up-to-date on when your items are coming this is truly a great way to order stuff!!you don't have to go to the store find parking get in get out it's a great way to buy things! I will keep on buying gifts and day to day items also.

I have couple of complaints when compared to the website. 1- most of the time reviewers photos don't show on the app. 2- the helpful or unhelpful buttons aren't always there. 3- when I'm viewing an item I cannot open the photos to view them in bigger size until I clear the cash

I've been waiting for a delivery from Amazon delivery, on the apps map it said the driver is 3 stops away. After watching the map and seeing where that the driver has made close to 60 stops over the last hour it still says the driver is 3 stops away. If I was a thief I'd love it because I could see everywhere the driver has gone and could easily take the packages from the doorway. Amazon needs to fix this!

I love Amazon but recently while using the app, if I navigate away from it and try to reopen the app, it flashes white for like 1/4 of a second and never opens. I have to restart my phone or uninstall and re-install. This didn't happen a few weeks ago. Must be with the new update. I'm using a Galaxy Note 9.

I use Amazon for 95% of my holiday and gift giving buying needs , it has never been a problem I love it. I did have 1 seller who shipped the product to the wrong address, my son never received it nor did the post office. I let Amazon know and was refunded quickly, the seller was outside the US and wanted me to let them ship another but I declined.

not many issues using the shopping part of it but everytime I click done Prime app closed due to an error. So for the last year can't watch any Prime shows or movies. So what am I paying for? I just did the mandatory update it recommended and the program is still not working. Must uninstall

its just nothing that I can say wrong and even when I do find something wrong, I say it and it seems to be fix. there is things that I would love to see added. Like changing from Business to personal. but I think this is such a great app and gies above and beyond to make it easy for customers.

newest version (18.1.0.100) causing endless boot loop on Xperia z3. I had to wipe and manually repair twice. After the second repair I did not install and the problem stopped. I used the previous versions daily. I'm not an engineer or programmer so sorry if I'm wrong but it seems to be the cause in my case.

Completely love this, BUT. I was kicked out of my first account so I made a new one. all was good for a while.. then I got kicked out again. I went to reset my password and it said that It worked and to trying logging back in. so I typed the same exact password in and it keeps telling me it's the wrong one.. i use this app for everything but it keeps doing this to me and it's making me very upset and mad. if you can give me my account back or fix the problem somehow I would give 5 stars.

I love the app, but there is something that concerns me, correct the problem and you get 5 stars. For the last few weeks, every time I open the app, it tells me I need to install the new app because this version won't be supported soon. Every time I try to update it, I get redirected to the original app. There are no updates or mentions of a new app. If anyone at Amazon pays attention, help me out.

New app! with none if the bugs worked out from the last app. Searching for anything is a joke and you cannot even click on the enlarge the photo option, ever, without a spinning wheel. Come on, a little less profits for stakeholders and a little more app dev?

it's a good app if it didn't keep crashing! it is very annoying when your trying to look at the item and it keeps saying something went wrong and you have to look for it again just for the same thing to occur.
I shouldn't have updated the app! The older version was just fine, I've tried using the new version a couple times and it's either slow or freezes my phone for a few minutes. Fix this problem asap!!

Amazon is of course super convenient and you can find anything and have it within a few days. Their refined search however is not very user friendly or intuitive. then there is the reviews. Buyer beware... make sure you select to see all reviews and then refine by Amazon verified purchases. Companies sell by making their product super appealing with positive reviews. They are constantly scamming Amazon's review system and Amazon makes it really easy for them to do because they benefit too.

Was informed that I needed to update my app. I did so and now I have problems accessing. Keeps telling me I need to "update app"...I will be uninstalling this. Totally worthless now. I once again updated on 10/21/18 and it still wants me to update every time I try to go to site. Extremely, extremely aggravated. Thanks for ruining my experience. Update: keeps asking to UPDATE APP. Absolutely ridiculous---ANOTHER UPDATE: keeps telling me to UPDATE(last available update was mid-Dec 2018 which i did)

Advertises via notifications every chance it gets. Literally just received a notification that only said "you could use a new smartphone." Really isn't great for one's mental health to expose themselves to more ads than necessary, when the web client works just fine on mobile.

I started reading the reviews to find out if there was any point of installing this app instead of just using the website. I think it's maybe a little bit faster to open the app but other than that it's pointless. Either way all the cents her are about Amazon itself so no thanks to the stupid commenters. You wouldn't come here to download Amazon if you haven't used the online version first, i assume..

Amazon is my favorite! Nothing more exciting than seeing the UPS guy walking up to my door with my package. Also, Amazon prime is great for movies. All of Amazons products are also awesome. I have a fireTV stick and I love it! I give them a five star thumbs up all around!!

Every time I click on my Amazon app lately, it says to install the upgraded version, I do, it will say installed, then it will do the same thing every time I go to open it! It's annoying! But otherwise, I love Amazon!!! Okay, pt 2 of my review..every time I go to open this app, it still says to open in the new upgraded version, I do, and the next time I go to this app, it has me repeating that process!!! Enough already! How do I get it to upgrade and stay there?

app is very laggy when checking color and size, even more laggy when closing the color and size menu. 6 or seven clicks to get to what I'm looking at. do I have to shave off part of the skin on my fingers for it to recognize my clicks.

Worth noting that any purchases you make using this app WON'T MAKE ANY DONATIONS to your chosen charities in Smile. Took me almost half an hour to get that little tidbit of information out of customer service! Very poor form. Push everyone to use the app and then 'forget' to mention that it actually disadvantages your charities. Browser only if you want to use Smile. Uninstalling until Smile is integrated.

Ordered twice off Amazon. First the order never showed up, now, a few years later in an attempt to try it again, wasted the $9 for 2-day shipping, which states will arrive by 8pm today. It's now 8:01pm and still nothing. Not impressed with Amazon. Honestly thought this time would be different.

amzon is great. been a prime member for years no issues. i buy food from whole foods, dog food and home goods from prime and pretty much everything else.... recently had some fraud and stolen packages (first issues ever)... took a few phone calls and threats to file a fraud report with bank but they so far have handled pretty well... waiting on a ups shipping label for al return and a email from a 3rd party seller... will update star rating when i see how it goes.
The app has become a little bit to genrral ,especially with the "bullet points", under the grid ,at the top left area of the home screen , which needs more explanation !!
Not as good as the prevoius version of the app. It is less responsive and doesn't allow me to delete items from wish lists. "Upgrades" should be better. This one is not.
App hasn't been updated since December, and it shows. nothing but bugs. stalls out all the time. click an Amazon ad in facebook and this app opens and stalls. no option to open in browser.

it's good to pay this prime service, I'm paying but many products are more expensive when you use your prime. If you buy without this service you pay up to $ 5.00 less. My question is .. what is this for if you pay monthly and pay extra for the products? I would like to include photos that I have taken from some products as proof but there is no option to do so.

Every dang time I sign in to a new device. I end up going through a painful process of changing my password knowing very well that I got it right the first time. I never get the "enter the syllable you see below" question right even though it's clear as day. I'm fed up. Fix this clusterf#>k.

all this 3rd party seller. u will get a refund 3-5 business days cause something was damaged or over priced. but 10 days has passed and oh it's yours banks fault. has got me turned off. used to love Amazon but it seems like the bigger the got the less they care. stuff when I tried prime 2 days shipping didn't even get here in 2 days. so why pay $$ for that.

It's a simple concept : if it ain't broke don't fix it! The more this app is "updated" the worse it functions. Revert this back to when it looked and functioned like the website and get rid of that damned tray!

I honestly can't complain about the app. I haven't stumbled upon any gltiches or featurs added that I haven't liked, plus it's Amazon. Ease of access to essentially everything you could ever need (except food I would rather buy that at the grocery store)

My least favorite way to shop. App features include never actually finding exactly what I'm looking for unless someone wants THAT specific to found ON SALE. 2-day shipping is a lie, whether you pay for it or with prime. Someday my review won't be an outlier. It will be the norm and it will be instantly deleted everywhere simultaniously by Alexa through the AWS platform.
